nodes.bodyText: @wslany please decide if we can move to 1
Actually, not yet, since user defined bricks are not yet merged into develop. The condition for language version = 1 is both this function as well as user defined bricks.

This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <string name="formula_editor_function_color_touches_color_parameter" translatable="false">(\'#ff0000\',\'#ff0000\')</string>
          
          
            
                <string name="formula_editor_function_color_touches_color_parameter" translatable="false">(\'#ff0000\',\'#00ff00\')</string>
          
      
    
    
  

According to

"hex color2" default value = #00FF00 (full green)
in https://jira.catrob.at/browse/CATROID-15
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1783,6 +1783,8 @@ needs read and write access to it. You can always change permissions through you
     <string name="formula_editor_function_touched">touches finger</string>
     <string name="formula_editor_function_collides_with_color">touches color</string>
     <string name="formula_editor_function_collides_with_color_parameter" translatable="false">(\'#ff0000\')</string>
+    <string name="formula_editor_function_color_touches_color">color touches color</string>
+    <string name="formula_editor_function_color_touches_color_parameter" translatable="false">(\'#ff0000\',\'#ff0000\')</string>
